Package com.artemis.annotations

Annotations used by Artemis, both runtime and during compilation,

See: Description

  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    LinkPolicy.Policy  
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Bind Deprecated
    DelayedComponentRemoval
    Guarantees that the decorated component is still present during EntitySubscription.SubscriptionListener.removed(IntBag) - regardless of removal method.
    EntityId
    Using this annotation, entity references can be safely serialized.
    LinkPolicy
    Annotation for entity-referencing fields in component types.
    PooledWeaver
    Transforms a Component into a PooledComponent.
    PreserveProcessVisiblity
    When optimizing an EntityProcessingSystem, don't reduce the visibility of BaseSystem.process().
    Profile
    Profile EntitySystems with user-specified profiler class, implementing ArtemisProfiler.
    SkipWire
    Skip reflective dependency injection on annotated field or class.
    Sticky Deprecated
    Transient
    Never persisted when serializing.
    UnstableApi
    Classes marked with this annotation may undergo extensive refactoring between releases.
    UseSetter Deprecated
    Wire
    Customizes reflective injection of ComponentMapper, EntitySystem, Manager and EntityFactory.

Package com.artemis.annotations Description

Annotations used by Artemis, both runtime and during compilation,

Runtime: Wire.

Annotation Processor for EntityFactory: Bind, Sticky, UseSetter.

Bytecode weaving (provided by CLI tool and gradle/maven plugin): com.artemis.annotations.PackedWeaver, PooledWeaver, PreserveProcessVisiblity, Profile.
